title: Walking on Eggs: The Astonishing Discovery of Thousands of Dinosaur Eggs in the Badlands of Patagonia
description: Two renowned paleontologists describe the discovery of a vast cache of unhatched dinosaur eggs in the remote badlands of Patagonia and their investigation into the meaning of the seminal discovery, interweaving their field adventures with an illuminating look at the groundbreaking techniques of modern-day paleontology. 25,000 first printing.
author: Luis M. Chiappe
